.ue-c-tooltip--hidden{position:absolute;left:-10000px;top:auto;width:1px;height:1px;overflow:hidden}.elmundo-theme-v6 .ue-c-tooltip--no-arrow:after,.elmundo-theme-v6 .ue-c-tooltip--no-arrow:before{border:solid transparent;content:none}.elmundo-theme-v6 .ue-c-tooltip--info{text-align:left;margin-right:1rem;font-family:Arial;font-size:14px;color:#a19f9f}.elmundo-theme-v6 .ue-c-tooltip--info-icon{position:relative;top:4px;cursor:pointer}.elmundo-theme-v6 .ue-c-tooltip--container&gt;:not(:last-child){margin-bottom:.3rem}.elmundo-theme-v6 .ue-c-tooltip button{background-color:transparent;padding:0;margin:0}.elmundo-theme-v6 .ue-c-tooltip li,.elmundo-theme-v6 .ue-c-tooltip p{color:#000;font-family:Roboto;font-weight:400;line-height:1.3em;padding:0;margin:0;font-size:.625rem}@media (min-width:46.25em){.elmundo-theme-v6 .ue-c-tooltip li,.elmundo-theme-v6 .ue-c-tooltip p{font-size:.8125rem}}.elmundo-theme-v6 .ue-c-tooltip ul{margin:0;padding:0;list-style:none}.elmundo-theme-v6 .ue-c-tooltip ul li:before{content:"\2212";display:inline-block;line-height:0;font-size:9px}.elmundo-theme-v6 .ue-c-tooltip a{margin-top:.4em;text-decoration:none;font-size:.625rem}@media (min-width:46.25em){.elmundo-theme-v6 .ue-c-tooltip a{font-size:.8125rem}}.elmundo-theme-v6 .ue-c-tooltip a:hover{text-decoration:underline}.ue-l-cover-grid__inner,main{background:#fff}
